comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Presumably Prince Henry, Duke of Gloucester (Henry William Frederick Albert; 31 March 1900 – 10 June 1974), member of the British Royal Family, the third son of King George V and Queen Mary. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Henry,_Duke_of_Gloucester

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Yes, I think you are probably right about the identity of young Prince Henry here.  We will expand the record to reflect more details.
